reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were so lucky to find a place like these in Rome! We didn't want to stay near Termini station because it's too crowded, and too touristic. So we discover this little gem, between Campo di Fiori and Trastevere.
reviews.title: Perfect!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Yes, it's a little hide, but they send us a map whith instructions of how to get there, and we went on google street view, and saw exactly were it was. Very easy.
reviews.title: Between Ponte Sisto and Campo dei Fiori

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: They put us on a great big room with a balcony! They have Sky on TV!
reviews.title: Another Great Boutique Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast was very nice, and the capputinos with little drawing that Petra does are so good!
reviews.title: our Fabulous home in Rome

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All the staff is very kind and do whatever is possible to help us. They did including a breakfast to go for us, as our flight was too early (6am).
reviews.title: A long weekend in Rome. A perfect location and a perfect hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This guest house is right in the heart of Rome, within walking distance from the main atractions in the city and the restaurant area (Trastevere).
reviews.title: Excelent value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was really comfortable. Great shower, good bed, Sky TV, nice heating and some great ammenities.
reviews.title: TRULLY BEST CHOICE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff is really nice and helpfull, and the breakfast is simple but good.
reviews.title: Good location and helpful staff
